title: 9x reports for using chat.
body: So I was in a game, this guy swapped from flash and exhaust to ghost and heal and tried to claim to me he was level 3, locked ryze support, took cs, and pushed the wave when i didnt want it pushed. Our diana mid, who didn't like seeing me give ryze shit for it (there was no negativity involved on my side.), promptly said, "report varus," then everyone and their grandmother says they will. Now I'm left here wondering what the fuck I'm getting reported for. Using a chat feature? Im not in the wrong for thinking that it's THEIR fault for not muting me am I? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Reporting flags the game for review is all. Won't affect you and might result in the Diana getting punished for asking to report when that's clearly against the rules.

If you did nothing wrong, like call ryze a feeding boosted black russian animal, you are in no danger at all.

Reports just make the system check for expulsions of stupidity and anger.
Good to know, I never really bothered to see how the reporting system works exactly, this gives me some relief. Thanks.
